body_html:
Hi @PAK90,

Having more information will help us debug your problem.

  • Are you referring to the standalone website (projector.tensorflow.org) or the tab in TensorBoard?
  • We used anti-aliasing but noticed that some users experienced the same problem as you, so we disabled it. If you saw the problem at projector.tensorflow.org, can you visit the website again and see if it works?
  • How many points were you using?
  • Is your zoom level 100%? If not, can you test if clicking on points at 100% zoom works?

Thanks for reporting this!

Is your zoom level 100%? If not, can you test if clicking on points at 100% zoom works?

Thanks for reporting this!
body:
Hi @PAK90,

Having more information will help us debug your problem.

- Are you referring to the standalone website (projector.tensorflow.org) or the tab in TensorBoard?
- We used anti-aliasing but noticed that some users experienced the same problem as you, so we disabled it. If you saw the problem at projector.tensorflow.org, can you visit the website again and see if it works?
- How many points were you using?
- Is your zoom level 100%? If not, can you test if clicking on points at 100% zoom works?

Thanks for reporting this!
